purpose: Outlines the three core AI systems powering the NeedAgent.AI audit experience: NeedAgentIQ™, VoiceFit Report™, and SkillScope™, plus an overview of how they integrate and work together.

coreSystemsOverview.title: Core AI Systems
coreSystemsOverview.description: Three integrated AI systems that power the complete audit experience

needAgentIQ.name: NeedAgentIQ™
needAgentIQ.tagline: Real-time intelligence while the audit is in progress
needAgentIQ.extendedDescription: Analyzes responses in real time during the audit. Detects business leaks and revenue loss patterns before the audit is finished. Acts like a live consultant (Fabio Sarcona, Founder and strategic mind behind NeedAgent.AI), reacting only when there's enough data. Highlights urgent issues (e.g., missed calls, unconfirmed quotes). Suggests Voice Skills with ROI projections and immediate action steps.
needAgentIQ.positioning: Not a report — a live business advisor built into the audit.

voiceFitReport.name: VoiceFit Report™
voiceFitReport.tagline: Final audit summary with tailored Voice AI recommendations
voiceFitReport.shortDescription: A personalized, AI-powered scorecard with visuals.
voiceFitReport.extendedDescription: Summarizes 30+ audit responses into a clear diagnosis of time and revenue leaks. Provides a snapshot of the current state and opportunities for improvement.
voiceFitReport.positioning: The bridge between current status and AI-powered potential.
components: Actionable next steps (plans, setup, deposit automation, etc.)

skillScope.name: SkillScope™
skillScope.tagline: Detailed breakdown of each Voice Skill
skillScope.shortDescription: An interactive knowledge panel for Voice Skills.
skillScope.extendedDescription: Opens when the user clicks 'Learn More' on a Voice Skill. Provides a guided walkthrough: what it does, how it works, expected ROI, and activation requirements. Uses business-friendly language, avoiding technical jargon. Focused on real impact and how it integrates into daily workflows.
skillScope.positioning: Clear, human-friendly insights — because good decisions need good explanations.

integration.description: How the three AI systems connect and work together during the audit.
